title: Courtyard Philadelphia Willow Grove Offers Sweet Savings Fo
text:
WILLOW GROVE, Pa. Traveling sports teams gearing up for another great season can win it all at Courtyard Philadelphia Willow Grove . Known for its commitment to comfort and convenience, the Willow Grove hotel takes it one step further with an exciting new offer. When sports teams book and actualize 10 or more rooms, they'll score big with discounted room rates, complimentary bus parking, 5,000 bonus Marriott Rewards points and five complimentary pizzas – perfect for celebrating a win. Teams that book and actualize 15 or more rooms will also receive a complimentary coach's room on top of the other incentives. Valid now through March 31, 2016 , this offer is the perfect opportunity for players to score big this season.
Whether a team of high school heroes competing in a tournament or college stars coming in for a game, all sports groups will find Courtyard the perfect home base while visiting Arcadia University (10.9 miles), Upper Moreland High School (1.6 miles), Ukrainian American Sport Center (6.6 miles), Penn State Abington (4.9 miles), BucksMont Indoor Sports Center (13.4 miles), Chestnut Hill College (10.8 miles), Gwynedd Mercy University (8.4 miles) and Holy Family University (17.2 miles).
Win or lose, teams will be coming out ahead when they end the day at the Willow Grove hotel. Players looking to refuel can indulge in some mouthwatering meals right on site at The Bistro – Eat. Drink. Connect. . From fresh salads and juicy burgers to delicious sandwiches and flavorful flat breads, the casual restaurant has something to satisfy even the pickiest of eaters. The Bistro is also open every morning, allowing guests to start their day with their favorite morning meal, along with a specialty Starbucks beverage.
When it's time to wind down, guests can retreat to relaxation in spaciously appointed accommodations . Teammates can post pictures from the game or keep up with friends using complimentary Wi-Fi. Kick back in luxurious bedding and enjoy a favorite show on a flat-panel TV. Large work desks and ergonomic chairs are also included, giving students the space they need to study.
Athletes nursing leftover energy can enjoy a brisk workout in the state-of-the-art fitness center, featuring a variety of free weights and cardiovascular equipment with personal TV screens. Or, enjoy a refreshing dip in the indoor pool and whirlpool.
For some team bonding off site, the Willow Grove hotel offers a fantastic location with easy access to Downtown Philadelphia and other top attractions . From Sesame Place and Willow Grove Park Mall to Peddler's Village and Valley Forge , there's something for every age and interest to enjoy.
About Courtyard Philadelphia Willow Grove
Courtyard Philadelphia Willow Grove at 2350 Easton Road, Route 611, in Willow Grove, PA is near Parx Casino, Peddler's Village and downtown Philadelphia . The hotel features 3 floors, 137 rooms, 12 suites, 2 meeting rooms with 1,360 square feet of total meeting space, a bistro, fitness center and indoor pool. For information, visit www.CourtyardWillowGroveSports.com or call 1-215-830-0550.
